name: AREA EXPLORER
description:
IN 1992 THE CANADIAN GOVERNMENT DISCOVERED SOMETHING IN NORTHERN NUNAVUT

It was an anomaly, dubbed "The Area". Several teams were sent to investigate the Area, but none returned. 

A decade passed and no progress was made, until the development of a program to remote control drones. This program faded into urban myth, until now.

The last version of Area Explorer quietly appeared on the internet, but it was heavily encrypted and unusable. With the help of several others, I am proud to bring you this piece of modern Canadian history, cracked and freely available to the public.

Explore The Area for yourself.
